com.anji.neat

Class NeatTargetFitnessFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgapcustomised.BulkFitnessFunction
      • com.anji.integration.TargetFitnessFunction
        • com.anji.neat.NeatTargetFitnessFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, java.io.Serializable

    public class NeatTargetFitnessFunction
extends TargetFitnessFunction
    Fitness function where error is subtracted from max fitness, then squared. Fitness is skewed such that max fitness is MAX_FITNESS. See calculateErrorFitness() for details. This mimics the error function used in Evolving Neural Networks through Augmenting Topologies .
    Author:
    Philip Tucker
    See Also:
    TargetFitnessFunction, Serialized Form

      • evolutionFinished

        public void evolutionFinished(HyperNEATEvolver evolver)
        Description copied from class: BulkFitnessFunction

        Deprecated in favour of event listeners such as GeneticEventListener or AHNIEventListener.

        This method is called when an evolutionary run has finished. It can be used to perform testing or other analysis on the fittest and/or best performing Chromosomes evolved during the run.

        Specified by:
        evolutionFinished in class BulkFitnessFunction
        Parameters:
        evolver - Methods on this object can be used to obtain the fittest and best performing Chromosomes evolved during the run.
